# [[premier]]; [[prime minister]]; [[president]]

====Usage notes====
The translation of ''prime minster'' in Chinese varies according to the country in question. For example, the prime minister of the United Kingdom, Japan and Belgium is translated as {{zh-l|首相}}, while the prime minister of India, Australia and Thailand is translated as {{zh-l|總理}}, the same term used to refer to the premier of the People's Republic of China.
